description: Bradford go top of League Two as a goal from Bobby Pointon after just 12 seconds helps clinch a 2-0 win over Crewe.
title: Bradford City 2-0 Crewe Alexandra
title_page: Bradford City 2-0 Crewe Alexandra - BBC Sport
maintext:
Bradford City are unbeaten across their last six home league games against Crewe Alexandra (W4 D2), keeping a clean sheet in five of those matches.
Crewe Alexandra have lost just one of their last six league games against Bradford City (W3 D2), with each of those three wins coming via a one goal margin.
Bradford City have won 11 of their last 12 home league games (L1), scoring 23 times in that run whilst only conceding five goals.
